name: Hallowed Eve
description:
After a long grueling battle the Hero's prevailed against the Evil One. Trapping them away below the Sea, and forcing their best and only General into a trap. Locking him away so that peace could come to the land once again.

     Except there was one problem, the Angel the Humans asked for has been cast out of Heaven, and the Evil locked away under the Sea may be the only one able to help her understand why. So with her help, it's up to the General of Evil to free the Evil One.

Lucifire must be set free!
